snippet: Officer Lawrence DePrimo received news coverage for his generosity, but little was known about the man he helped, who in an interview on Sunday gave his name as Jeffrey Hillman.
abstract: Jeffrey Hillman, homeless man photographed by a Times Square tourist receiving boots from New York City Police Officer Lawrence DePrimo, is seen once again walking barefoot through city streets; says he is grateful for DePrimo's gesture, which earned the officer notoriety and praise online, but that he has hidden the shoes for fear their very value could put him in danger.

byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and ALEX VADUKUL

lead_paragraph: Officer Lawrence DePrimo received news coverage for his generosity, but little was known about the man he helped, who in an interview on Sunday gave his name as Jeffrey Hillman.

headline.seo: Homeless Man Says He’s Grateful for Boots but He’s Barefoot Again
headline.main: Homeless Man Is Grateful for Officer’s Gift of Boots. But He Again Is Barefoot.
headline.print_headline: Homeless Man Is Grateful for Officer’s Gift of Boots. But He Again Is Barefoot.
